name: Oven Fried Potatoes II
author: Phyllis Zusman
summary: Potatoes, wedged, rolled in a mixture of lemon juice and oil,  and baked in hot oven.
ingredients: 2 large baking potatoes, cut into wedges
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and spray with vegetable cooking spray
In a shallow bowl combine oil and lemon juice
Dip potatoes in oil/lemon mixture and season with salt and pepper, to taste
Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes
Remove from oven and turn wedges over
Return to oven and continue cooking until crisp and brown on both sides, about 10 minutes more
